Summary: Very reflective of the sun v - chevron shape
divs: Sighting DetailsWas working in the back by my shop and in the sky about a one - two miles sightly north of west just west of US131 noticed a bright reflective shining changing a bit (like someone moving a mirror to catch and reflect the sun) went in grabbed my field glasses and when not reflecting towards me I'd see what looked like the wins of a large plane could not see a tail or nose was moving not very fast a steady course west - a little north altitude was changing they would pitch side to side slightly causing the reflection to flash at me that was when they would change altitude a bit at one point they held position for a few minutes just still in one position and then they continued at that time I quit observing them (2) and went about my work, after another 10 min I went in washed up and joined my wife watching a movie about 3-5 min after sitting down I muted the TV as I thought I heard something I sure did there were 3 helicopters I believe S-70A's they were pitch black,, coming from the east quickly at first as they were over the fields to our east we could hear them throttle back and seen them drop altitude a bit as they slowed down they started a slightly north of west track and ended up flying right through where I had seen the two reflective objects when they were holding in one position and the choppers went in the same path as the object went after they were holding position I at first when seeing the objects did not think anything but shortly after the choppers which was 4:12 (I looked at the clock to see how long it had been since I seen the objects) It was at that point I felt It was something and decided to find somewhere to let someone know.
